Detailed Description

The MenuPool creates menus out of configuration data. Configuration data is either provided by an Aragon resource file (which can be located in a customization pack or directly in the ffs), or by a static configuration. For the static configuration, MenuTableNodes have to be created where the configuration data is provided by following structs:
  • FeatureItemContainerTableEntry
  • MenuTableEntry
  • FeatureItemContainerContentTableEntry

Such MenuTableNodes can be created anywhere in the code. The nodes are linked together like a linked list and read in by the MenuPool.

If building with Aragon and an Aragon configuration is available, the menus are constructed using this Aragon configuration. If no Aragon configuration can be found, the static configuration is used.
